responses.rationale: Quoted source uses vivid, non-technical language ('bad guy viruses') to frame the threat, preventing a default to Neutral.
Factual description of virus characteristics ('highly contagious') and spread without explicit framing cues.
Reports a scientific statement about potential increasing risk ('greater the risk') using neutral, factual language.
Contains vivid, non-technical description of symptoms ('Screaming very loud, whole-body tremors'), preventing a default to Neutral.
Factual description of characteristics ('highly contagious') and potential outcome ('could cause some shortages') without explicit framing cues.
Factual statement about a risk factor ('at higher risk') without explicit framing cues.
